associateserviceroletoaccount.name: AssociateServiceRoleToAccount
associateserviceroletoaccount.description: Associates the user's account with IAM roles controlling various permissions needed by AWS DeepLens for proper functionality.

batchgetdevice.name: BatchGetDevice
batchgetdevice.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens devices.

batchgetmodel.name: BatchGetModel
batchgetmodel.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens Models.

batchgetproject.name: BatchGetProject
batchgetproject.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens Projects.

createdevicecertificates.name: CreateDeviceCertificates
createdevicecertificates.description: Creates a certificate package that is used to successfully authenticate and Register an AWS DeepLens device.

createmodel.name: CreateModel
createmodel.description: Creates a new AWS DeepLens Model.

createproject.name: CreateProject
createproject.description: Creates a new AWS DeepLens Project.

deployproject.name: DeployProject
deployproject.description: Deploys an AWS DeepLens project to a registered AWS DeepLens device.

deregisterdevice.name: DeregisterDevice
deregisterdevice.description: Begins a device de-registration workflow for a registered AWS DeepLens device.

getassociatedresources.name: GetAssociatedResources
getassociatedresources.description: Retrieves the account level resources associated with the user's account.

getdeploymentstatus.name: GetDeploymentStatus
getdeploymentstatus.description: Retrieves the the deployment status of a particular AWS DeepLens device, along with any associated metadata.

getdevice.name: GetDevice
getdevice.description: Retrieves information about an AWS DeepLens device.

importprojectfromtemplate.name: ImportProjectFromTemplate
importprojectfromtemplate.description: Creates a new AWS DeepLens project from a sample project template.

listdeployments.name: ListDeployments
listdeployments.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens Deployment identifiers.

listdevices.name: ListDevices
listdevices.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens device identifiers.

listmodels.name: ListModels
listmodels.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens Model identifiers.

listprojects.name: ListProjects
listprojects.description: Retrieves a list of AWS DeepLens Project identifiers.

registerdevice.name: RegisterDevice
registerdevice.description: Begins a device registration workflow for an AWS DeepLens device.

removeproject.name: RemoveProject
removeproject.description: Removes a deployed AWS DeepLens project from an AWS DeepLens device.

updateproject.name: UpdateProject
updateproject.description: Updates an existing AWS DeepLens Project.
